member.name: T:SapInterfaces.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SapInterfaces.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SapInterfaces.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:SapInterfaces.Properties.Resources.DocUploadSoapRequestEnvelop
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:sap-com:document:sap:soap:functions:mc-style"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <urn:_-seal_-zladWsDmLoaderCall> <IInputData> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!-- <_BAse64>xBase64 data </_base64> --> <item> <Name>_BASE64CONTENT</Name> <Value>$_BASE64CONTENT$</Value> </ite [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:SapInterfaces.Properties.Resources.GetXpSoapRequestEnvelop
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:sap-com:document:sap:rfc:functions"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <urn:_-SEALC_-SWK_DMS_KPRO_URL_GET> <I_CLASSNO></I_CLASSNO> <I_CLASSTYPE></I_CLASSTYPE> <I_DAPPL>PDF</I_DAPPL> <I_DOKAR>$I_DOKAR$</I_DOKAR> <I_DOKST>$I_DOKST$</I_DOKST> <I_MATNR>$I_MATNR$</I_MATNR> <I_RES4></I_RES4> <I_SUBTYPE></I_SUBTYPE> <T_CLASS_SELECTION> <!--Zero [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:SapInterfaces.Properties.Resources.TestXPdoc
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Byte[].

member.name: M:SapInterfaces.SapDownloader.DownloadXpDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the XP document for given article number. Saves the XP document (PDF) to given location.
member.param: The file name to save the file in (should be PDF).

member.name: M:SapInterfaces.SapDownloader.DownloadXpDoc(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the XP documentation related to spreader serial number from SAP.

member.name: M:SapInterfaces.SapInterface.SetTagValue(System.String@,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a tag value in a string.

member.name: M:SapInterfaces.SapInterface.GetXpInformation(System.String)
member.summary: Connects to SAP and retrieves the XP information.
member.param: The serial number of the spreader.

member.name: M:SapInterfaces.SapUploader.EncodeFileToBase64String(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes a file in BASE64 string format.

member.name: M:SapInterfaces.SapUploader.UploadPdf(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: The prefix for the file name and desription. Should be 'TESTREPORT' for the test report, and 'ELECTRIC_SCHEME' for the electric scheme.
